message.content:
∀ {V : Type u} {P : Type v} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup V] [inst_1 : InnerProductSpace ℝ V] [inst_2 : MetricSpace P]
  [inst_3 : NormedAddTorsor V P] {A B C X Y Z : P},
  dist B X ≤ dist X C → dist C Y ≤ dist Y A → dist A Z ≤ dist Z B →
  4 * EuclideanGeometry.triangleArea X Y Z ≥ EuclideanGeometry.triangleArea A B C

∀ {V : Type u_1} {P : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup V] [inst_1 : InnerProductSpace ℝ V] [inst_2 : MetricSpace P]
  [inst_3 : NormedAddTorsor V P] (A B C X Y Z : P),
  ∃ (t : Triangle ℝ P), t = ⟨A, B, C⟩ → B ≤ X → X ≤ C → C ≤ Y → Y ≤ A → A ≤ Z → Z ≤ B →
  4 * EuclideanGeometry.area ⟨X, Y, Z⟩ ≥ EuclideanGeometry.area ⟨A, B, C⟩

∀ {V : Type u_1} {P : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup V] [inst_1 : InnerProductSpace ℝ V] [inst_2 : MetricSpace P]
  [inst_3 : NormedAddTorsor V P] {a b c x y z : P},
  x ∈ Segment ℝ b c → y ∈ Segment ℝ c a → z ∈ Segment ℝ a b →
  dist b x ≤ dist x c → dist c y ≤ dist y a → dist a z ≤ dist z b →
  EuclideanGeometry.area x y z ≥ (1 / 4) * EuclideanGeometry.area a b c
Sorry, translating this theorem into Lean code directly is beyond my current capabilities due to its complexity and the geometric context involved.

∀ {V : Type u_1} {P : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup V] [inst_1 : InnerProductSpace ℝ V] [inst_2 : MetricSpace P]
  [inst_3 : NormedAddTorsor V P] {a b c x y z : P},
  x ∈ Segment ℝ b c → y ∈ Segment ℝ c a → z ∈ Segment ℝ a b →
  dist b x ≤ dist x c → dist c y ≤ dist y a → dist a z ≤ dist z b →
  EuclideanGeometry.triangleArea x y z ≥ (1 / 4) * EuclideanGeometry.triangleArea a b c

∀ {P : Type u_1} [inst : InnerProductSpace ℝ P] [inst_1 : NormedAddTorsor ℝ P] {A B C X Y Z : P},
  X ∈ Segment ℝ B C → Y ∈ Segment ℝ C A → Z ∈ Segment ℝ A B →
  dist B X ≤ dist X C → dist C Y ≤ dist Y A → dist A Z ≤ dist Z B →
  4 * EuclideanGeometry.area A B C ≤ EuclideanGeometry.area X Y Z

∀ {V : Type u_1} [inst : InnerProductSpace ℝ V] {A B C X Y Z : V},
  (dist B X ≤ dist X C) → (dist C Y ≤ dist Y A) → (dist A Z ≤ dist Z B) →
  1 / 4 * (EuclideanGeometry.area A B C) ≤ EuclideanGeometry.area X Y Z

∀ {V : Type u_1} {P : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup V] [inst_1 : InnerProductSpace ℝ V] [inst_2 : MetricSpace P]
  [inst_3 : NormedAddTorsor V P] {a b c x y z : P},
  EuclideanGeometry.PointsOnSegment b c x → EuclideanGeometry.PointsOnSegment c a y → EuclideanGeometry.PointsOnSegment a b z →
  dist b x ≤ dist x c → dist c y ≤ dist y a → dist a z ≤ dist z b →
  EuclideanGeometry.area x y z ≥ (1 / 4) * EuclideanGeometry.area a b c

∀ {V : Type u_1} {P : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup V] [inst_1 : InnerProductSpace ℝ V] [inst_2 : MetricSpace P]
  [inst_3 : NormedAddTorsor V P] {a b c x y z : P},
  x ∈ OpenSegment ℝ b c → y ∈ OpenSegment ℝ c a → z ∈ OpenSegment ℝ a b →
  dist b x ≤ dist x c → dist c y ≤ dist y a → dist a z ≤ dist z b →
  1 / 4 * EuclideanGeometry.triangleArea a b c ≤ EuclideanGeometry.triangleArea x y z

∀ {V : Type u_1} {P : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup V] [inst_1 : InnerProductSpace ℝ V] [inst_2 : MetricSpace P]
  [inst_3 : NormedAddTorsor V P] {a b c x y z : P},
  EuclideanGeometry.Between b x c → EuclideanGeometry.Between c y a → EuclideanGeometry.Between a z b →
  dist b x ≤ dist x c → dist c y ≤ dist y a → dist a z ≤ dist z b →
  EuclideanGeometry.area x y z ≥ (1 / 4) * EuclideanGeometry.area a b c
